Title: Out of the Past
Director: Joaquim Dos Santos, Ki Hyun Ryu
Writer: Bryan Konietzko (creator), Michael Dante DiMartino (creator), Michael Dante DiMartino, Bryan Konietzko
Actors: Janet Varney, David Faustino, P.J. Byrne, J.K. Simmons
Plot: After being imprisoned by Tarrlok, Korra attempts to analyze the mysterious visions she has been having. Meanwhile, Tenzin, Lin, Mako, Bolin and Asami search for Korra, having been given false information by Tarrlok.
